name: world-bank-data-api
description: A server that fetches data indicators available with the World Bank as part of their data API

tools.name: get_indicator_for_country
tools.description: Get values for an indicator for a specific country from the World Bank API

prompts.name: List Countries
prompts.description: Lists available countries in the World Bank open data API.
prompts.text: List all countries available in the World Bank data.

prompts.name: List Indicators
prompts.description: Lists available indicators in the World Bank open data API.
prompts.text: List all indicators available in the World Bank data.

prompts.name: Analyze Indicators
prompts.description: Analyzes specific indicators for a selected country.
prompts.text: Analyze the poverty indicators for Kenya.
